titleStmt.title: The right way to heauen prayers and meditations of the faithfull soule with the spirituall morning sacrifice and consolations for the sicke.
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Pierre, 1568-1658.
Baylie, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Miller] for George Edwardes and are sold in the Old Baily, in Green Arbor, at the Angell,

notesStmt.note: "A familiar instruction to comfort the sicke" has separate dated title page, with Miller's name in the imprint; pagination and register are continuous.
Pages 433-442 missing in number only; text is unaffected.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
